::Ramulus::

The two bots carrying Ramhorn reach the CR chambers, Ramulus dropping Ramhorn 
in. He looks at Lunarpine.

"We have a five day cease-fire with the newcomers," he says, "That they'll 
hopefully honor. We should all get some rest during that time."

He activates his comm-link, transmitting to all Maximals, "All Maximals, we 
have a five day cease fire with the Newcomers. Don't fire on them unless they 
fire on you first."
